text_01.text:
A slideshow component for cycling through elements, like a carousel.

A carousel component is a container which contains a set of 'tiles' - simpler elements, normally teasers - which are moved horizontally.

There are some options configurable:

  • 'Use controls':
    if 'on' controls to slide manually are show on the left and the right side
  • "Show indicators':
    if 'on' a set of bubbles is shown at the bottom each representing one element; the current element is marked and each element can be selected manually by clicking the corresponding indicator
  • 'Autostart' and 'Interval':
    Start time controlled cycling automatically with the specified interval
  • 'Mouse enter doesn't stop'
    normally thy cycling is stopped if the mouse is inside of the carousel; this can be switched off
